emptyCard.header:
All your QR codes
Now in one place

permissionScreen.cameraSubtitle: To scan QR codes, the app needs permission to access your camera.
permissionScreen.imageSubtitle: To scan QR codes from images, the app needs permission to access your photos.
permissionScreen.locationSubtitle: To scan for nearby Wi-Fi networks, the app needs permission to access your location. You can decline, but Wi-Fi scanning won't be available.

onboardingScreen.title: Orange Pass
onboardingScreen.subtitle1: Organize and store QR codes for your bank accounts, loyalty cards, and e-wallets.
onboardingScreen.subtitle2: Your QR codes are securely backed up and synced with the cloud.
onboardingScreen.subtitle3: Access and manage your QR codes anytime, anywhere.

termsOfService.agreementPrefix: By continuing, you agree to our
termsOfService.termsOfServiceContent1: To ensure a positive experience for all users, please follow these community guidelines:
termsOfService.termsOfServiceContent2:
In summary:
* Don't engage in illegal or harmful behavior. Don't post inappropriate content.
* Respect privacy. Don't share others' QR codes without permission.
* Protect your account. Don't share your login information.
termsOfService.privacyPolicyContent1: Orange Pass is committed to protecting your privacy. We only collect information necessary to improve your app experience, such as name and email to personalize your account and communicate with you.
termsOfService.privacyPolicyContent2:
We commit to:
* Keeping your data secure. Not sharing personal information without consent.
* Using advanced security measures to protect your information.
* Giving you full control over your data, including the right to delete your account.

settingsScreen.title: Settings
settingsScreen.confirmLogoutMessage: Are you sure you want to logout?
